name: data_visualization
description: Visualizes the provided table of data in the given chart type. Use this function to visually present data to the user.

table.description: The table of numeric data to visualize as a two-dimensional array of numbers. The first dimension are the rows. Each row must have the same number of columns.

rowLabels.description: The labels for the rows in the table. The length of this array must be equal to the first dimension of the table array.

columnLabels.description: The labels for the columns in the table. The length of this array must be equal to the second dimension of the table array.

chartType.description: The type of chart to produce.
